hero_subtitle: Bhumicare replaces outdated reports with simple, actionable advice, helping farmers increase yields, save resources, and secure their future.
problem_desc: Today, both farmers and the government face the same big problem: wrong or missing soil data. This leads to wasted resources and uncertainty. Farmers guess on water and fertilizer because soil tests are rare and slow. Official surveys are costly, infrequent, and quickly become obsolete.
problem_point_3: Uncertainty in crop and yield planning
solution_title: This is Where Bhumicare Makes the Difference
solution_subtitle: Our integrated system of hardware and AI provides a complete, modern solution to an age-old problem.
feature_1_desc: Get continuous, real-time data on soil nutrients (NPK), pH, and moisture, replacing infrequent and slow lab tests.
feature_2_desc: Receive simple, actionable guidance in regional dialects (Hindi, Odia, English) that farmers can easily understand and act upon.
feature_3_desc: Live, aggregated maps provide a ground-level truth for farmers and policymakers, unlike static government surveys.
feature_4_desc: The device and app are designed to work reliably even without a stable internet connection, caching data until it can sync.
dashboard_preview_title: Your Central Hub for Soil Intelligence
dashboard_preview_desc: Our intuitive dashboard makes complex soil data simple to understand and act upon. Get real-time metrics, AI-powered recommendations, and historical trends at a glance.
how_it_works_subtitle: A seamless 4-step process from soil to solution.
how_it_works_step_1_desc: Our IoT device continuously measures NPK, pH, moisture, and temperature in the soil.
how_it_works_step_2_desc: Data is sent to the cloud via Wi-Fi, LoRa, or 5G, with offline caching for reliability.
how_it_works_step_3_desc: Our AI advisor combines soil, crop, and weather data to generate insights.
how_it_works_step_4_desc: Receive simple, voice-first advice in your own language directly on the app.
impact_title: Grow More. Spend Less. Protect the Future.
impact_desc: Bhumicare delivers tangible, data-driven results that empower farmers and strengthen the agricultural ecosystem.
impact_validated_tech_desc: Technology Readiness Level: TRL 4, field-tested and ready for deployment.
impact_alignment_desc: Supports Digital Agriculture Mission, PM-KISAN, and more.
sdg_2_desc: Bhumicare helps increase crop yields by up to 30% and reduce resource waste through data-driven farming. This directly contributes to food security and sustainable agriculture, ensuring more food is grown efficiently.
sdg_6_desc: Our AI-powered irrigation advice allows farmers to reduce water usage by up to 40%. By optimizing water application, Bhumicare helps conserve this vital resource and prevent runoff of fertilizers into water bodies.
sdg_12_desc: Bhumicare promotes responsible production by enabling precision agriculture. By applying the exact amount of fertilizer and water needed, we reduce chemical waste and encourage a more sustainable consumption cycle.
sdg_13_desc: Efficient use of nitrogen-based fertilizers, guided by our real-time data, reduces emissions of nitrous oxide, a potent greenhouse gas. This helps mitigate climate change and promotes climate-resilient agriculture.
product_gallery_subtitle: From prototype to field, see the evolution of our IoT device.
product_gallery_footer: Our proprietary hardware is currently at Technology Readiness Level 5 (TRL 5), undergoing rigorous testing in simulated and real-world environments to ensure accuracy and durability.
testimonial_1_quote: Bhumicare's ground-level data is the missing piece in precision agriculture. It has the potential to revolutionize how we manage soil health at scale.
testimonial_2_quote: A brilliant application of IoT and AI to solve a real-world problem for millions. This is the future of sustainable farming.
testimonial_3_quote: The simplicity of receiving advice in my own dialect makes all the difference. It's like having an expert in my pocket.
